name: (Un)real Love
description:
My brackeys game jam submission

its VERY buggy I'm sorry I didn't have a lot of time haha.

Story:

Lachie and Jess were soulmates who loved each other so much people said they shared the same soul. After Jess' death, Lachie went inside himself to find past memories of her. Follow his journey through the inner tresses of his mind to try and escape this depression.
